title: Add encoding parameter to sort command

text:
Its a tricky question.
decoding is good, but you can construct `SORT` to get keys and values by reference
and what if you don't want to decode part of keys or
there may be more keys causing decode errors slowing response processing...
I don't see simple solution right now.
clean_text: it tricki question decod good construct get key valu refer dont want decod part key may key caus decod error slow respons process I dont see simpl solut right

text:
Good point. Actually we need a bunch of encoders -- first for _key_ and encoders for every _get_patterns_. 
Final method signature becomes a mess easy.
Feel free to close as WontFix if you agree.
